short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Mute, block and unblock pesky trolls to make them unfollow you.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Get rid of pesky trolls on twitter by:

★ Muting
★ Blocking
★ Unblocking

in one click. You will no longer see their tweets and they will have been forced into unfollowing you.
